dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 5617 IH: STAR Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. McCarthy (for himself, Mr. Lucas, Mr. Babin, Mr. Calvert, Mr. Mike Garcia of California, Mr. Issa, Mr. McCaul, Mr. Moolenaar, Mr. Obernolte, Mr. Posey, and Mr. Weber of Texas) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Science, Space, and Technology

form.official-title: To amend title 51, United States Code, to extend the learning period for commercial human space flight.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Space Transformation And Reliability Act or the STAR Act.
Paragraph (9) of section 50905(c) of title 51, United States Code, is amended by striking 2023 and inserting 2031.
